name: git_app_builder
title: git App Builder
summary: Builds an app from a git repo

inputSpec.name: repo_url
inputSpec.label: git URL
inputSpec.help: URL of git repo to be cloned

inputSpec.name: ref
inputSpec.label: Ref to build
inputSpec.help: Branch, tag, or commit ID to be checked out

inputSpec.name: credentials
inputSpec.label: Private key file
inputSpec.help: File containing private key to use to authenticate to the git server

inputSpec.name: recurse
inputSpec.label: Recurse?
inputSpec.help: If true, runs dx-build-app from every subdirectory that has a dxapp.json file in it

inputSpec.name: publish
inputSpec.label: Publish?
inputSpec.help: If true, publishes the resulting app(s)

inputSpec.name: build_options
inputSpec.label: Options to pass to builder method
inputSpec.help: Hash of extra options to be provided to dx_build_app.build_and_upload_locally
